name: Drift MAX: OffRoad Pro 4X4
description:
Drift MAX 2021 : Real Drift Experience



Drift Max, the new game with a Realistic style!







- Realistic drift system
- High quality experience!
- Become the best driver in a great experience
- Weather (rain, snow, storms, etc.)
- Supports daytime system (morning, noon, sunset, night)
- Wonderful and distinctive cars!
- Realistic Map (City, Airport, Main Line)
- Online (very soon !!)



Drift Max, try it now
